mapper.select: select count(if(ifnull(cnt,0) between 0 and 5,1,null)) as '0-5', count(if(cnt between 6 and 10,1,null)) as '6-10', count(if(cnt between 11 and 15,1,null)) as '11-15', count(if(cnt > 15,1,null)) as '16-' from user u left outer join (select count(*) as cnt, user_email from auction group by user_email) auc on u.user_email = auc.user_email

select count(if(ifnull(cnt,0) between 0 and 5,1,null)) as '0 - 5', count(if(cnt between 6 and 10,1,null)) as '6 - 10', count(if(cnt between 11 and 15,1,null)) as '11 - 15', count(if(cnt > 15,1,null)) as '16 -' from user u left outer join (select count(*) as cnt, report_receiver from report group by report_receiver) rep on u.user_email = rep.report_receiver

select count(if(ifnull(cnt,0) between 0 and 5,1,null)) as '0 - 5', count(if(cnt between 6 and 10,1,null)) as '6 - 10', count(if(cnt between 11 and 15,1,null)) as '11 - 15', count(if(cnt > 15,1,null)) as '16 -' from (select distinct u.user_email,cnt1 + cnt2 as cnt from user u left outer join (select deal.user_email_buyer, count(*) over(partition by deal.user_email_buyer) as cnt1 from deal) d1 on u.user_email = d1.user_email_buyer left outer join (select deal.user_email_seller, count(*) over(partition by deal.user_email_seller) as cnt2 from deal) d2 on u.user_email = d2.user_email_seller) innerq
